livecopysync.granite:title: Synchronize Live Copy with Live Copy Source, keeping local modifications

livecopyreset.granite:title: Reset Live Copy to state of Live Copy Source, removing local modifications

livecopysuspend.granite:title: Suspend Live Copy from further rollout operations

suspend.granite:title: Suspend Live Copy from further rollout operations for this Folder only
suspend.jcr:title: Suspend Live Copy

suspendChildren.granite:title: Suspend Live Copy from further rollout operations for this Folder and its children
suspendChildren.jcr:title: Suspend Live Copy

livecopydetach.granite:title: Detach Live Copy from Live Copy Source

wizard.jcr:title: Folder Properties
wizard.cancelHref: ${empty header.Referer ? granite:concat("/assets.html", granite:encodeURIPath(empty param.item ? requestPathInfo.suffix : param.item)) : header.Referer}

include.text: Sync everything in this folder sub-tree to dynamicmedia

exclude.text: Exclude everything in this folder sub-tree from dynamic media sync

authorization-setting.fieldDescription: You might need to configure a Closed User Group.
authorization-setting.name: granite:AuthenticationRequired

text.text: The Live Copy has been suspended. No action will be performed on a roll out.

deepinheritance.fieldDescription: If checked Live Copy configuration is effective on all children
deepinheritance.name: msm:isDeep

authorization-setting.fieldDescription: You might need to configure a Closed User Group.
authorization-setting.name: granite:AuthenticationRequired

text.text: The Live Copy has been suspended. No action will be performed on a roll out.

deepinheritance.fieldDescription: If checked Live Copy configuration is effective on all children
deepinheritance.name: msm:isDeep
